result.execSummary:
The defendant Randell S Brom was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: $265.60 fine/cost to be paid to the Clerk of Courts Office. Payment plan of $25.00 per month to begin on April 1, 2015 and on the 1st of each month thereafter.
Not to have abusive contact with: Alyssa Brom, K.B., H.B., and A.M.P.
Must take batterer's class while on probation.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Randell S Brom

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
CASES:  14CF344 & 14CF429.  Defendant Randell S Brom in court with attorney Kate Mary Murtaugh.  Daniel Joseph Tolan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  BJM-clerk 11:09 am.  14CF344 - Def plea of G at to Ct 2.  14CF429 - Def plea of G as to amended Ct 1.  Tolan to draft amended Complaint.  CT - accepts pleas, finds Def G of Ct 2 in 14CF344 & Ct 1 as amended.  Enters JOC.  14CF344 - Ct 1 - Dismissed.  14CF429 - Ct 2 - Dismissed.  

SENTENCING:  w/h sent.  2 yrs prob, NO abusive contact w/Alyssa Brom & KB, HB, AMP.  Must take batterer class while on prob. To pay $265.60 on each misd. PP of $25.00/mo due 04/1/15 & on first day of each mo thereafter.  11:26 am adj.
NOH Defendant's - Return to Sender, Not Deliverable as Addressed, Unable to Forward.
Final pre-trial on April 17, 2015 at 10:00 am.

CASES: 14CF344, 14CF429 Defendant Randell S Brom in court with attorney Kate Mary Murtaugh.  Daniel P. Steffen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  KJB- Clerk. 11:10AM Atty Murtaugh req bond mod. State- agrees to no abusive. CT amends bond to no abusive contact with Alyssa Brom, KB, HB, or AMP. CT modifies on face of bond. 11:18am adj.  Final pre-trial scheduled for April 17, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Not to have abusive contact with: Alyssa Brom.  Must appear at all future court appearances.  Not to commit any new crimes.  Defendant shall give written notice to the Clerk of this Court within 48 hours of any changes of address or telephone number.
